reviewText: this was the worst not what i thought it was just women working out no boot camp no fighting with jousts or running a course

I'm a fan of the Peach DVDs, so I've got a bunch of them, and HARDBODY BOOT CAMP is a moderately good one of theirs. I actually got it because most of the Peach DVDs I have are comprised of short disconnected vignettes that are strip-tease and soft-core porn with one or two girls in each, so I thought it would be fun for a change to get one that has a story to it. Well, the "boot camp" aspect of this is mostly ignored except as an occasional background, so again this is mostly short segments of strip-tease, shower scenes, and girl-girl soft core porn. This would be fine, but most of the segments are filmed in slow-motion, so unless you like that it gets to be rather lethargic at times. However, with a bunch of the sexy Peach babes in it, this DVD still has some good segments and nice camera shots, with the shower scenes probably the best. Usually the women are fully nude. Still, I would start with some other Peach DVDs before this one.

By the way, the run time is one hour, and the picture is full screen 1.33:1. The extras on it are a pretty decent photo gallery and trailers of 4 other Peach DVDs. It actually should be R-rated, since there's nothing X about it.
